description: This file defines an Angular service called StatusService which provides methods for performing CRUD operations on status entities via HTTP API calls.

classes.name: StatusService
classes.description: Angular service to interact with status API endpoints, providing CRUD operations for status objects.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Fetches a list of all status objects for the authenticated user.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves a single status object by its ID.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new status using the provided request payload.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing status identified by ID with the provided payload.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Deletes a status identified by ID.
